cause.description:
There has to be some action taken to the amount of plants and other non-meat products being eaten in a daily basis by our population. We did not grow up as a human society killing these helpless creatures, so why is it now that we decide to wage war upon their races.
1. The Savage genocide of lettuce at Buffalo Hill
cause.mission: Save the poor, helpless plants being savagely torn apart and eat meat
cause.name: Save Plants, Eat Meat
